Sinopse: Amid violent political riots in Paris, France, five activists flee the dangerous capital. But with a bag crammed with stolen cash, the despairing fugitives know they'll need a safe hideout to spend the night. However, they are running out of time and luck. And as they find shelter in a remote, seemingly friendly hostel, the unsuspicious late-night visitors have already placed themselves in harm's way. Now, only a miracle can save them. Do the hopeless guests have what it takes to survive their sadistic hosts' brutal hospitality?—Nick Riganas
